org.recognizer
Class Tools

java.lang.Object
  org.recognizer.Tools

public abstract class Tools
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class to perform operations on images. These operations are needed by methods of the class Recognizer.

Author:
pauline ruegg-reymond

Method Detail

correspondingPoint

public static double[] correspondingPoint(double[][] p,
                                          double[][] q,
                                          double[] u,
                                          int flag)
Computes the deformation of one point.

Parameters:
p - - interest points in template image.
q - - corresponding interest points in processed image.
u - - point of template image we want to find in processed image.
flag - - indicates the method.
Returns:
Position of point in processed image corresponding to 'u'.

horizontalOverlap

public static boolean[] horizontalOverlap(ij.measure.ResultsTable blobs)
Sees if blobs pairwise overlap horizontally.

Parameters:
blobs - - table describing the blobs.
Returns:
Boolean array: blobs number i and j overlap if corresponding index is true. If ji, corresponding index is i*L - (i+1)*i/2 + j-i-1.

numOfPixPerRow

public static int[] numOfPixPerRow(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip,
                                   int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int width,
                                   int height)
Counts the number of non zero pixels on each row of a region of an image.

Parameters:
ip - - image to treat.
x - - x-coordinate of the region of interest.
y - - y-coordinate of the region of interest.
width - - width of the region of interest.
height - - height of the region of interest.
Returns:
The number of non zero pixels per row.

numOfPixPerCol

                                   int x,
                                   int y,

                                   int height)
Counts the number of non zero pixels on each column of a region of an image.

Parameters:
ip - - image to treat.
x - - x-coordinate of the region of interest.
y - - y-coordinate of the region of interest.
width - - width of the region of interest.
height - - height of the region of interest.
Returns:
The number of non zero pixels per column.

numOfPixPerLine

public static int[] numOfPixPerLine(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip,
                                    int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int width,
                                    int height,
                                    double angle)
Counts the number of non zero pixels on each parallel to a given line of a region of an image.

Parameters:
ip - - image to treat.
x - - x-coordinate of the region of interest.
y - - y-coordinate of the region of interest.
width - - width of the region of interest.
height - - height of the region of interest.
angle - - angle the parallel lines we are interested in form with horizontal (in degrees).
Returns:
The number of non zero pixels per row.

perspective

public static ij.process.ImageProcessor perspective(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip,
                                                    double[] p0,
                                                    double[] p1,
                                                    double[] p2,
                                                    double[] p3,
                                                    double[] q0,
                                                    double[] q1,
                                                    double[] q2,
                                                    double[] q3)
Transforms a four-sided selection in an image into another quadilateral.

Parameters:
ip - - image to process.
p0 - - coordinates of an edge of the four-sided selection in original image. maps to q0.
p1 - - coordinates of an edge of the four-sided selection in original image. maps to q1.
p2 - - coordinates of an edge of the four-sided selection in original image. maps to q2.
p3 - - coordinates of an edge of the four-sided selection in original image. maps to q3.
q0 - - coordinates of an edge of the quadrilateral in destination image. maps to p0.
q1 - - coordinates of an edge of the quadrilateral in destination image. maps to p1.
q2 - - coordinates of an edge of the quadrilateral in destination image. maps to p2.
q3 - - coordinates of an edge of the quadrilateral in destination image. maps to p3.
Returns:
An image containing a bounding box of quadrilateral (q0, q1, q2, q3). Pixels outside the quadrilateral are not copied.

rotate

public static ij.process.ImageProcessor rotate(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip,
                                               double angle,
                                               boolean enlarge)
Rotates the image by an angle of 'angle' degrees clockwise.

Parameters:
ip - - contains the image to treat
angle - - angle of rotation in degrees
enlarge - - if set to true, dimensions of the rotated image are changed in order to contain the whole rotated image. Otherwise, dimensions are kept the same as in the original image.
Returns:
The rotated image
